wallets.name: EUDI Wallet Reference Implementation
wallets.description: Android and iOS reference wallet application for the EU Digital Identity Wallet (EUDI). Built on the Architecture Reference Framework (ARF). Supports issuing (OpenID4VCI), remote presentation (OpenID4VP + DCQL), and proximity presentation (ISO/IEC 18013-5 / mDoc). Intended as a technical reference and demo; not a production wallet.

wallets.name: EUDIW Reference Issuer
wallets.description: Reference/demo web issuing service for the EUDI Wallet ecosystem (EUDIW Issuer). Intended to support development and testing of OpenID4VCI issuance flows alongside the reference wallet.

wallets.name: EUDI Reference Verifier
wallets.description: Reference verifier/relying party backend implementing OpenID4VP (1.0). Acts as a trusted verifier endpoint and provides APIs for initializing transactions and receiving wallet responses. Intended as a development/reference tool, not a production-ready verifier service.
